MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 9:17pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.37AM on 31st March 2021.
